FuncDef: This command configures the minimum number of free addresses in this subnet. If the actual number of free addresses in this subnet falls below this configured minimum, a notification is generated.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the minimum number of free addresses in this subnet. Values-0 to 255.
indicates the value indicates a percentage.
Enables a system-generate event when all available addresses in the pool/subnet of local DHCP server are depleted.
